tags: None
review: Dr Balakrishna is an amazing physician. He is a very senior physician. He does not advise unnecessary tests and medication. Even during covid wave he guided my family properly with minimal medications, we felt better in 3 days. I myself have suggested him to several friends, they all are impressed with him. He practices in BGS Gleneagles and also available in his clinic  after 8 30 PM in RR Nagar.

tags: None
review:
Refered our blood test results for a review and suggest modification in medicines if required. 
Interaction was good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is friendly, took time to analyse, and totally satisfied with his treatment. Explained in detail what could be wrong and didn't give much medicines.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Its first time I diagnosed  diabetes (sugar) and met doctor to know how to control this with medicine and he suggested me to start insulin from day-1 without confirming either it can be controlled by medicine or not. Later when I insisted him for medicine then, he wrote 1 medicine and within 3 days my sugar level has came down by 50 points. My balance diet and workout has also helped in reducing sugar. Later when I met him with report, he asked me to continue medicine but again saying that soon I need insulin. ** ***** ** *** *** ***** ** * ********** ** ***** **** ******** *** *** ******* ** ** ********** ******** When I asked, either I have type-1 or type-2 diabetic, ** *** *** ********** ** *** **** ***** ****** ********* *** was  telling me % of beta cell remain in my body without any test. I'm planning to consult another doctor next week as this is the first time

tags: None
review: ************** Friendly and Practical. Explained in Detail. Punctual and Focused. Examination too was very professional. Very good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Balakrishna G K , Internal medicine...He is the God. He helped my wife without much medication in a day , who was sick for more than a month. We are grateful for him till our last breath. The way he gives confidence to patients cures the problem 50% on spot...visited for low bp and low confidence issues.

tags: None
review: *** * ************ ******* After 3 weeks *** ******** ********* ***** **** ** **** *** ********** he wrote medicines and referred to a govt hospital. ** *** ** ***** ** **** *** ******* ** * **** ******** *** ** **** *** ***** **** **** *** **********When called later regarding side effects of medicine did not respond properly and said go to the govt hospital.** *** ****** ************ *** *** ******* ********* **** *****

tags: None
review: Doctor is very friendly and patient. Thoroughly discusses case in detail before suggesting treatment..also very experienced .. would definitely recommend. however the front desk needs and/or practo needs to do better appointment management..the doctor typically takes 20-30mts for each patient so you would end up waiting long unless you can call , coordinate with front desk and go..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Balakrishna is an Intelligent plus Highly experienced Doctor. His way of Analysis is Next Level, and his Treatment and Observation is a Class Apart. Dr. Balakrishna reminds me of my Family Doctor when I was young.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
